app.name: CV Builder
app.tagline: Create your professional CV and take a step forward in your career
app.description: Simplify your job search process and find your dream job

hero.title: Next-Generation CV Creation Platform
hero.subtitle: Create AI-powered, dynamic, and interactive CVs

features.title: Why CV Builder?
features.subtitle: Innovative features that transform your job search process

realtime.title: Real-Time Updates
realtime.description: Update your CV in real-time. Just got a new certificate? Add it immediately and use your updated CV for applications.

video.title: Video CV Support
video.description: Introduce yourself with a video. Showcase your personality and skills more effectively. The modern way to connect with employers.

aiAssistant.title: AI Assistant
aiAssistant.description: Get AI-powered suggestions to optimize your CV. Make job-specific CV edits and increase your chances of acceptance.

analytics.title: CV Analytics
analytics.description: Track your CV's performance. Which employers viewed your profile? How many times was your CV viewed? All statistics at your fingertips.

steps.title: Create a Profile
steps.description: Enter your basic information and create your professional profile

steps.title: Customize Your CV
steps.description: Choose from modern templates and personalize your CV

steps.title: Add a Video
steps.description: Introduce yourself with a short video and stand out

steps.title: Apply for Jobs
steps.description: Apply to job listings with a single click and advance your career

blog.title: Blog
blog.description: The latest articles on career and CV preparation

contact.title: Contact
contact.description: Get in touch with us. We will get back to you as soon as possible.
contact.name: Your Name
contact.subject: Subject
contact.successMessage: Your message has been sent successfully. We will get back to you shortly.
contact.errorMessage: Your message could not be sent. Please try again later.

pricing.title: Pricing
pricing.description: Choose the plan that suits your needs

404.title: Page Not Found
404.description: The page you are looking for does not exist or may have been moved.

500.title: Server Error
500.description: Sorry, something went wrong. Please try again later.
